activities: OpenSesame does not sell, rent or share personally-identifiable information to or with any third party not affiliated with or owned by OpenSesame, except that OpenSesame may disclose such information to service providers who may assist OpenSesame in providing services to you or in such areas as data storage. OpenSesame will disclose your personal information to third parties when you give us permission to do so.
